episodes.title: The Findings
episodes.description: After all of the searching and heartache, the hunt for answers leads to a court room in Sydney, where Coroner Teresa O'Sullivan reveals what she believes happened to Marion Barter. What the findings mean and what the future holds for Sally, as the The Lady Vanishes team say goodbye after a 5 year podcast investigation. Fundraiser for Ghislaine Danlois-Dubois. https://schoolworkssupplies.com.au/the-lady-vanishes-fundraiser Laura Richards' Crime Analyst Series on Marion: https://www.crime-analyst.com/p/case-006/ Laura's most recent Crime Analyst episode: https://www.crime-analyst.com/ep-175-analyzing-the-murder-of-dr-naomi-dancy-and-deaths-of-mary-and-edmund-garstin-with-sam-robins/ And Laura's Crime Analyst You Tube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCksfRSwfwFqUCjcxKYju6_Q Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Countdown - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Troublemaker Theme - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ Look Out - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Rising Tide by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5027-rising-tide License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Impact Prelude by Kevin MacLeod https://incompetech.com/ License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Enter the Maze by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/3712-enter-the-maze License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Myst on the Moor by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4104-myst-on-the-moor License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Tipping Point
episodes.description: Emotions are in overdrive with just days until the State Coroner delivers her findings into Marion’s disappearance. Criminal Behavioural Analyst Laura Richards gives her final assessment of the case, and how you can help one of Ric Blum’s victims. Plus, some BIG news from The Lady Vanishes team. Fundraiser for Ghislaine Danlois-Dubois. https://schoolworkssupplies.com.au/the-lady-vanishes-fundraiser Laura Richards' Crime Analyst Series on Marion: https://www.crime-analyst.com/p/case-006/ Laura's most recent Crime Analyst episode: Ep 174: Analyzing the Murder of Dr Naomi Dancy with Sam Robins, Part 4 And Laura's Crime Analyst You Tube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCksfRSwfwFqUCjcxKYju6_Q Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Troublemaker Theme - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ The Call - Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com Countdown - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Unnatural Situation by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4567-unnatural-situation License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com Impact Prelude by Kevin MacLeod https://incompetech.com/ License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Kiss of Death
episodes.description: Our deep dive on Ric Blum continues as we learn more about who he is and the trail of destruction he's left in his wake. Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Look Out - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Walking into Darkness - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Troublemaker Theme - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ Unnatural Situation by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4567-unnatural-situation License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com Rising Tide by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5027-rising-tide License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com The Call - Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Introducing The Man Behind the Rose
episodes.description: Disgraced former Beattie Government health minister Gordon Nuttall was sentenced to 14 years for corruption and perjury. Until now he hasn’t been allowed to tell his story without the very real threat of going back to jail. Now he is lifting the lid on Queensland’s most high profile political scandal. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: The Beginning
episodes.description: Evelyn retraces her steps to the beginning, when her mother met and married Willy Wouters, aka Ric Blum. And we chase down leads that yield stunning information about Mr Blum and about Marion. Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com The Order’s Theme - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Round That Corner - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Countdown - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Poltergeist - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Silent Turmoil - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Belgian Folk Muisc - Belgium-Stokkendans Rising Tide by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5027-rising-tide License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com Ivory by Luca Fraula Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/8312-ivory License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Le Diabolique
episodes.description: Alison, Evelyn and the Spotlight crew travel to Luxembourg, where colleagues Tom and Yannick reveal what they’ve uncovered, and we catch up with the brave woman who rejected Ric Blum’s advances and witnessed some very strange behaviour. Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Crime Thriller Podcast by Dave Deville Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/9532-crime-thriller-podcast License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Look Out - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Informative Pizzicato by Steven OBrien Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/10920-informative-pizzicato License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: The Debt
episodes.description: Some parents leave their children an inheritance, Ric Blum left his daughter Evelyn a debt worth millions of francs. Plus, we feature the gripping interview of Liam Bartlett speaking to Ghislaine Danlois, who claims Mr Blum left her more than 300,000 Euros poorer. Music Credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com My Belgian Rose: Elliot Shaw-Charles Hart (1918) Unnatural Situation by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4567-unnatural-situation License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com Deadly Sorrow - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Daughter
episodes.description: Alison and Sally meet with Evelyn, the daughter of Ric Blum, before Alison and Evelyn travel to Belgium to unravel more of her father’s intricate past. Spotlight, Seven’s current affairs show, captures the incredible new developments. Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Darkest Child by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/3615-darkest-child License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Walking into Darkness - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Nebula - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Troublemaker Theme - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ Unsafe Roads by Alexander Nakarada Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/4923-unsafe-roads License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Aftermath
episodes.description: Sally reflects on the new evidence revealed in court; an old friend of Marion’s speaks out… plus could another woman have had a close call with Ric Blum? Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Troublemaker Theme - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ Countdown - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ Breaking News 3 by Sascha Ende Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5952-breaking-news-3 License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: The Inquest: Part 19
episodes.description: A stuttering and stumbling Ric Blum comes under pressure, as lawyers seek an explanation about comments he made for the first time in court. Plus - Mr Blum's response to the evidence of new witnesses. Thanks to Alliance Française de Brisbane afbrisbane.com Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Final Step by Rafael Krux Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5294-final-step- License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Rising Tide by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5027-rising-tide License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com A Darker Heart - https://audionautix.com The Call - Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com Troublemaker Theme - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ The Order’s Theme - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Countdown by Alexander Nakarada Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4865-countdown License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/ Breaking News 2 by Sascha Ende Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5951-breaking-news-2 License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: The Inquest: Part 18
episodes.description: The inquest into the disappearance of Marion Barter resumes, with two women in their 90s - the star witnesses. So determined are they to have their voices heard and their stories told, they get up in the middle of the night in Europe to recount their interactions with Ric Blum. Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Final Step by Rafael Krux Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5294-final-step- License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Rising Tide by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5027-rising-tide License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://incompetech.com A Darker Heart - https://audionautix.com The Call - Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com Troublemaker Theme - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ The Order’s Theme - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Countdown by Alexander Nakarada Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4865-countdown License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Artist website: https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com/ Breaking News 2 by Sascha Ende Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5951-breaking-news-2 License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Gaslight
episodes.description: An inquest announcement, as a poisons expert and a criminal behavioural analyst give their assessment of Ric Blum's history. Plus, putting together the pieces - a timeline of Blum's life and actions, and how they link to Marion Barter. Links for Laura Richards: Crime Analyst podcast: https://www.crime-analyst.com/episodes/ Crime Analyst Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@crimeanalyst Website: https://www.thelaurarichards.com/ Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Cornered - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Walking into Darkness - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Look Out - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Troublemaker Theme - Myuu https://www.thedarkpiano.com/ Bad Encounter - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com The Call - Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com Breaking News 3 by Sascha Ende Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5952-breaking-news-3 License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: The One Who Got Away
episodes.description: Monique Cornelius finally speaks out - revealing the terrifying admission which made her fear Ric Blum, plus the reason she believes she escaped his advances. Also, an appeal for another possible victim in Melbourne. What an estranged daughter and cousin's widow had to say. Music credits: Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Unnatural Situation by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4567-unnatural-situation License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Perspectives by Kevin MacLeod Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4207-perspectives License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license Crickets SFX - Played N Faved https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQb8sOHpJl4EMFlotcqxrjQ Down the Rabbit Hole - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Bad Encounter - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Look Out - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Don’t Die on Me - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com Bad Encounters - Myuu - thedarkpiano.com The Call - Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Tainted Love (part 2)
episodes.description: In her own words - Ghislaine's recollections of Ric Blum. episodes.title: Tainted Love
episodes.description: It's an all too familiar love story built on a web of lies that left a woman heartbroken, humiliated and robbed of her life savings. Only this time, it happened in Belgium. More details of Ghislaine's affair with Ric Blum will leave you gobsmacked, as will the memories of other listeners who are now coming forward to detail their encounters with the `man of many names.' episodes.title: The Catch-Up - 6
episodes.description: For our new listeners, and our long time supporters who want a refresher, this 6-part bonus catch-up series of The Lady Vanishes provides an overview of the case of Marion Barter. It's been a long journey from where we started back in April 2019 to where we are today, and these catch-up episodes will get you up to speed, quickly. episodes.title: Wild Claims
episodes.description: A new alleged victim of Ric Blum comes forward in Belgium after seeing coverage of The Lady Vanishes in a Luxembourg newspaper. Her extraordinary and very familiar claims of romance, deception, theft and... poison. episodes.title: The Inquest Resumes
episodes.description: A former bank manager makes startling new claims of seeing Marion in public just a few years ago, as the Coroner hears from the lawyers about what findings she should make... about what happened to Marion. episodes.title: Secrets and Lies
episodes.description: We dig deeper into Ric Blum's finances and find out what options are available to investigators and if there are other charges that can be laid against him. episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 21
episodes.description: In a preview to episode 41, Sally, Bryan, Alison and Joni discuss where the investigation is at and where to from here. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 2
episodes.description: This week in Conversations; Sally, Alison and Bryan address your questions about Marion's passport, her missing stored possessions and the hotels where she stayed in England. Also, the team discusses reports the NSW Police Force Missing Person's Unit will be shut down. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: The Money Trail
episodes.description: The origins of Ric Blum and how he apparently funded his high-flying lifestyle on a pensioner's budget. We also hear from a man who says Ric used to boast to him about his nefarious activities. episodes.title: The Inquest: Part 15
episodes.description: Mr Blum's evidence becomes more outlandish and contradictory, yet despite gaping holes in his testimony, he maintains he's telling the truth. Instead, he accuses all of the women who've spoken out against him of lying. Plus, the extraordinary love letter that you won't be able to forget. episodes.title: Digging for Answers
episodes.description: Since the inquest into Marion Barter's disappearance was adjourned a couple of months ago, devastating floods and Covid have been playing havoc with lives in this part of Australia. However, we've been doing some digging for information behind the scenes as we prepare for Mr Blum to take the stand for three final days. episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 20
episodes.description: Day 1 of the inquest into Marion Barter's disappearance. Sally and the team meet before proceedings begin and look ahead at what will be a big two weeks in Sydney and northern New South Wales. **Please note** this episode was recorded before a Covid outbreak in Sydney prevented Sally from travelling there for the inquest. episodes.title: Inquest 2021 Promo
episodes.description: Less than a month to go until the inquest into Marion Barter's disappearance. Sally prepares for what could be the final destination in her long journey for information. Theme: Identity Crisis - - Myuu thedarkpiano.com https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Introducing - Accidental Celebrity
episodes.description: Imagine your trauma leads the news. Your private life is then public property. Your anonymity is lost. That’s what it’s like to become an accidental celebrity. Now, the spotlight is turned around. Each weekly episode offers rare media insights from an ordinary Australian who faced an extraordinary event. They expose the tricks of a competitive trade – the relentless pursuits, the manipulation and misrepresentation, the betrayals of truth and trust – with journalist Fiona Reynolds. Learn too why they participated in media coverage. This is the inside story on a shrewd industry that plucks unknowns from obscurity to feed our fascination with adversity and the strength of the human spirit. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 19
episodes.description: While relieved at the revelation of a Coronial Inquest, Sally discusses the toll it has taken and how she gets through every day. The team also chats about what else is happening behind the scenes. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 1
episodes.description: As we add final touches to episode 6, we're busily investigating some of the leads you - our listeners - have given us. In our first bonus episode, The Lady Vanishes team delves deeper into the mystery disappearance of Marion and addresses some of the case’s more intriguing anomalies. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 19. Turning Point
episodes.description: It's the decision we've been waiting so long for: one that brings relief and validation for Sally after half a lifetime searching for her mother. And 13 years after she was first asked, Sally finally becomes the face of Missing Persons week. Theme: Identity Crisis - Myuu Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com plus: Enter the Maze by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/3712-enter-the-maze License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 18
episodes.description: Sally, Bryan and Alison discuss the latest tips that could help with the investigation into Marion’s disappearance. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 18. Secret Nuptials
episodes.description: The team uncovers more documents which lead to a surprise new theory about Marion’s disappearance. The involvement of another person is almost certain, as one of the country’s leading Coronial experts breaks down Marion’s case and explains what we can expect from an inquiry. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks: Rising Tide by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5027-rising-tide License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ A Darker Heart - https://audionautix.com Final Step by Rafael Krux Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5294-final-step- License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 17. Baby Steps
episodes.description: The wheels of justice turn slowly, but the team finally receives some new information after last year's tribunal hearing, which reveals how the system failed Marion and Sally. Also, tune in for the latest from the Coroner on an inquest. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks: Enter the Maze by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/3712-enter-the-maze License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Rising Tide by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5027-rising-tide License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ Final Step by Rafael Krux Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5294-final-step- License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 16. Home Truths
episodes.description: Did Marion ever come back to Australia after embarking upon her European vacation 23 years ago? The team acquires a crucial document confirming a stunning truth. Australian icon Ita Buttrose reveals her connection to Marion and Sally meets the new Officer in Charge of the investigation. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com plus A Darker Heart - Jason Shaw https://audionautix.com Music from https://filmmusic.io "Perspectives" by Kevin MacLeod ( https://incompetech.com ) License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) 'Ita' by Cold Chisel See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 17
episodes.description: As the final chapter for the year approaches, we discuss the latest breakthrough and why we're sure the mystery of what happened to Marion will be solved. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 16
episodes.description: The TLV team discusses the discovery of another person who may be able to help with the investigation into Marion’s disappearance – the pilot! They also foreshadow another imminent breakthrough and recap the last episode and the interesting online debate that has resulted. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 15. Progress
episodes.description: Our super sleuths track down someone we've been looking for since the investigation began. We revisit the Luxembourg connection and catch up with an inspirational man who knows more than most people what Sally is going through. He shares his story and explains what to expect if there's an inquest. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com plus Music from https://filmmusic.io "Spy Story: The Agent" by Sascha Ende (https://www.sascha-ende.de) License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Bonus: Conversations 15
episodes.description: The team announces that another major hurdle has been cleared. We also pay tribute to Marion on her birthday and discuss the most recent contact with Fernand Remakel in Luxembourg. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 14
episodes.description: The TLV team discusses the latest leads being chased, along with recent interviews and where to from here. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 14. DNA
episodes.description: Could Marion's old ballet slippers help the police investigation into her disappearance? Sally provides her DNA, a former colleague offers a new lead and we finally catch up with the last person to see Marion before she left Australia. Plus, a mysterious email from overseas - what is the link to Monsieur Remakel? Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 13. A Tangled Web
episodes.description: Unexpected new information about Marion's bank accounts: what it means for the investigation. We finally track down Marion's former boyfriend. Plus... The Good Cop, Ron Iddles. What's his take on the case? Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com Music from https://filmmusic.io "Hitman" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com) See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 12. Leydon v NSW Police
episodes.description: We reveal a major breakthrough! Plus, inside the NSW Civil and Administrative Tribunal (NCAT) hearing as Sally seeks access to documents in Marion's case file. Also, we track down the first police officer who Sally dealt with. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com, Jason Shaw at audionautix.com and the track Octagon by Silent Partner is licensed under a Creative Commons License. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 13
episodes.description: The TLV team is joined by radio legend Greg Cary. Plus NSW Police’s referral to the Coroner and why it’s media unit is now refusing to deal with Alison Sandy. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Introducing 'Pendulum' - a new podcast
episodes.description: The body of a young mother is found beside an isolated road on a dark, foggy night at Sarina in 1978. Was it murder or suicide? Experts have thought both. Could a killer still be on the run? From the team that brought you The Lady Vanishes, a new podcast - Pendulum. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 12
episodes.description: The TLV team discusses its most recent trip to Byron Bay and details of the pending review into the investigation of Marion’s disappearance by NSW Police Homicide Unit. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Bonus: Conversations 11
episodes.description: The Lady Vanishes team is joined by Mark Leveson, who shares a similar story to Sally following the disappearance of his son. But his perseverance was eventually rewarded when his son’s remains were found following a Coronial Inquest. Also, the latest on the investigation. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 10
episodes.description: This week Sally, Alison and Bryan focus on ways to find out who made the withdrawals from Marion's bank account. Plus, they're joined by author and journalist Madonna King - the person responsible for introducing Sally and Alison. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 9
episodes.description: What happened at the NCAT hearing with NSW police. Why it's so important to Sally's plight to find out what happened to her mum. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 8
episodes.description: This week Sally, Alison and Bryan learn that a new police detective is taking on the case. Sally reaches out to find solicitors, real estate agents and travel agents who may have met with Marion before she went overseas. We're also joined by Australian True Crime podcaster Meshel Laurie. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 7
episodes.description: The Lady Vanishes Team is joined by Le Courrier Australien Editor-in-Chief to discuss the ad featuring M F Remakel, plus the latest on our investigation into Marion’s disappearance. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 11. Luxembourg
episodes.description: Our quest for answers leads us to the door of a man in Luxembourg. Could this be the culmination of Sally's search for her mum, Marion? Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 6
episodes.description: We discuss our trip to Luxembourg, the Episode 10 cliff hanger and where to from here. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 10. Closing In
episodes.description: A mysterious personal ad for a man looking for love. Could Marion have met with an exotic stranger? Our hunt for answers leads us overseas, retracing the last known footsteps of Marion Barter. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 5
episodes.description: Sally and Bryan talk to Alison from Europe where they’ve been chasing down new leads into Marion’s disappearance. They discuss where they’re at now and answer more listeners' questions, as well as provide an update on investigations already underway. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 9. Sleuth
episodes.description: They're carrying out their own investigations in an effort to find Marion. What our growing band of sleuths is finding out. Plus, Sally's nearest and dearest: the impact this search is having on them. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 4
episodes.description: The aftermath of episode 8: unanswered questions from our trip to Tyalgum. Plus, progress on new leads and what our sleuths are doing in the U.K. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 8. Hidden
episodes.description: We received some tips that Marion may be involved with a group in northern New South Wales. So, we hit the road to investigate. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: BONUS: Conversations 3
episodes.description: This week we discuss Sally’s latest attempt to get her mum on the National Missing Person’s database. We also look at core elements of the mystery and of course, the upcoming episode 8. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 7. Toxic
episodes.description: Disturbing allegations about what went on at Marion's last known place of employment. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 6. Byron
episodes.description: We go back to Byron Bay. What is it about the seaside town and surrounding hinterland that lures so many? We speak to experts about the reasons people go missing and look into the attraction of cults. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 5. Mysterious Messages
episodes.description: A call to Crime Stoppers and mysterious social media messages from faceless strangers. Does someone know the truth? Sally's ongoing battle with bureaucracy as she chases answers in her hunt for Marion. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 4. Taken
episodes.description: Episode 4: Taken We reveal the startling new evidence that puts in doubt the assumptions of family and the police about why and how Marion vanished. We also examine the how the police investigation is at odds with Sally Leydon’s belief that her mother was taken – either by a person, a group or some other foreign influence. From the moment she was reported missing the police determined Marion had simply decided to walk away from her children, her friends, her career and her possessions. Is it time to consider an alternative scenario? Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: 3. Teaching and turmoil at school
episodes.description: It was a dream job for a passionate teacher at a prestigious Gold Coast school. But then, everything changed. What happened to make Marion suddenly want to get away? Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Episode 2: Who was Marion?
episodes.description: Her life. Her loves. Would she leave it all behind? Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Episode 1: Left Behind
episodes.description: In 1997, Marion Barter boarded a plane for England for the trip of a lifetime. Instead, her loved ones never saw her again. What happened? Where is she? Marion’s daughter will never give up trying to find her. Most of the music for The Lady Vanishes was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at mattiacupelli.com and Jason Shaw at audionautix.com See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: The Lady Vanishes - Trailer
episodes.description: A much loved mother, teacher and friend steps on a plane for an overseas adventure and is never seen again. Marion Barter, the former wife of Australian soccer great Johnny Warren, went missing in 1997. The circumstances surrounding her disappearance are bizarre. Her daughter has never given up hope of finding her. This is her quest. Presenter and Executive Producer - Alison Sandy Presenter and Investigative journalist - Bryan Seymour Writer and Producer - Sally Eeles Sound Design - Marc Wright Graphics - Jason Blandford Most of the music was composed by Nicolas Gasparini at thedarkpiano.com with additional tracks by Mattia Cupelli at www.mattiacupelli.com/ See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
